page.title: 18A Survey of Scartho. Part 4.
page.content: {Churches}are well represented in our area. There is St. Matthews,{( Church {of England ),}a{Mormon}church called 'The Church of Jesus Christ of the Latter Day Saints', and a{Roman {Catholic}Church. {Attitudes.} According to interview sources a lot of people still think there is something of a village atmosphere, in our area, especially in those places near to{Scartho.}It is felt, however, that a lot could be done to bring the community much closer together. An example of this sort of{community action}takes place at{Christmas}when old people are invited into{Fairfield Middle School.
